summary:
Sheri Geoffreys Corporate Photography

Southern California Corporate Photographer, Sheri Geoffreys provides corporate
photography for business & editorial purposes. Her executive photography
talents include executive portraits, executive head shots & executive group
imagery for your corporation's annual report. Her eye for portraiture & head
shots is utilized by corporate business executives, music artists & editorial
entities in Los Angeles County, Orange County, Riverside, San Diego & San
Bernardino California.

(949) 388-4070 | Email

Corporate Photography  Executive Portraits

“Sheri has a keen eye and a great heart. She is perhaps the most intuitive and
efficient photographer we have ever used.”

\- Shelley Hoss, President, Orange County Community Foundation, Irvine, CA

## Executive Portraits

It is typical to frequent companies on a monthly, quarterly or yearly basis to
photograph new employees. … See More Executive Portraits

## Editorial

Her passion for life is reflected in all she does. She has a true gift in her
ability to bring out the uniqueness of her subjects. … See Corporate Editorial
Work

## Executive Group Portraits

This type of professional photography captures the personality and
professionalism of individuals. … See More Executive Group Portraits

#### Sheri Geoffreys Photography, Inc

Based in Orange County, CA  
Local - National - International  
Southern California professional photographer, Sheri Geoffreys provides
corporate photography for business & editorial purposes. Her eye for
portraiture & head shots is utilized by corporate business executives, music
artists & editorial entities in Los Angeles County, Orange County, Riverside,
San Diego & San Bernardino California. Her executive photography talents
include executive portraits, executive head shots & executive group imagery
for your corporation's annual report. - corporate portraits, corporate head
shots, business head shots, business portraits, annual report photography,
corporate editorial photography, executive portrait photography, executive
portraiture - " Professional Photographer "  
Call 949-388-4070
